verbose_text: ADRP is considered a reliable and sensitive marker for LDs in steatosis, and it promotes the incorporation of lipids in LDs at the cost of reduced lipid export via lipoprotein secretion or reverse transport; by contrast, TIP47 preferentially labels nascent LDs and binds to the LDs in response to lipid loading.
evidence: TIP47 preferentially labels nascent LDs               and binds to the LDs
